name: Music Racing Car
description:
Music Racing Car is a historic action game that sets a new standard for mobile music racing games – you have to play it to believe it.One of the most addictive, entertaining physics based on driving games and music beats ever made! And it's free!

Music Racing Car is a music-adapting racing/runner/action game based on our Well-organized music to race! Your reaction speed, and the level you are will decide the stars you earn in it.

Gather beats, catch the rhythm and most importantly, avoid Various types of the obstacle .That’s all you need to remenber!!
Enjoy the music while playing and collect gems to catch the beat!

The Features: 
Different Theme
We prepared 5 different game themes for you. They are the Technology pixel world，Racing adventure，Pirate glory，Game escape，Halloween paradise.Each Theme offers you the new obstacle.

Easy Controls
Swiping sideways and jump to collect beats and avoid obstacles. This very addictive game is designed to be simple and easy for anyone to enjoy.Just find your new world here.

3D pixel designed environments
Experience the beautifully minimalistic 3D design and Pixel graphics of the game world.
Journey across the mysterious, special themed background landscape. Great visual effects, one of the best graphics on Android.


Electronic Music
The game world presents various electronic indie music. Join the fast-paced journey of rhythmic electronic music . For the best experience play with headphones and full volume.


Racing Adventuring across the world, you jump over and swiping to obstacles ,do not let your enemies to finish the race to complete all music.Welcome to the Best new music racing experience.

Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game.
